sourcesContent:
Pokémon Collection Stats

Package Probabilities

  • {{ pack }} Pack: {{ packageProbabilities[pack] | number: '1.2-2' }}% chance of finding a new card

Best Package to Open

{{ bestPackage.name }} Pack with a {{ bestPackage.probability | number: '1.2-2' }}% chance of finding a new card

Ownership Summary

Total Cards Owned: {{ totalOwned }}

Total Cards Missing: {{ totalMissing }}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { CollectionService } from '../collection.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-stats', templateUrl: './stats.component.html', styleUrls: ['./stats.component.css'] }) export class StatsComponent implements OnInit { packageProbabilities: { [key: string]: number } = {}; bestPackage: { name: string; probability: number } = { name: '', probability: 0 }; constructor(private collectionService: CollectionService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.getProbabilities(); } getProbabilities(): void { this.collectionService.getProbabilities().subscribe(data => { this.packageProbabilities = data.packageProbabilities; this.bestPackage = data.bestPackage; }); } // Define objectKeys method to retrieve keys of an object objectKeys(obj: object): string[] { return Object.keys(obj); } }
